desc: The Helium ACT shop supports the growth, and use of the Helium network in Australia. We hold stock of parts and accessories in Australia to eliminate delays when ordering from overseas. Whether you are deploying Helium hotspots, interesting in building DIY sensors, or using off-the-shelf sensors and nodes, we can help.

layout.text: Hardware and accessories for LoRaWAN devices to grow the Helium network in Australia
